actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide that payments under such title shall be available to meet the educational needs of educationally deprived children from low-income families whether or not such children attend schools in areas having a high concentration of such children, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Disadvantaged Children Assistance Act - Provides, under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, that financial assistance for the education of children of low-income families shall be available to local educational agencies whether or not such children reside in areas having a high concentration of such children, if specified conditions are met.

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide that payments under such title shall be available to meet the educational needs of educationally deprived children from low-income families whether or not such children attend schools in areas having a high concentration of such children, and for other purposes.
